alert.note: Alert for Accomack; Northampton (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued June 05 at 8:22PM EDT until June 06 at 3:00AM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM EDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Accomack and Northampton Counties. * WHEN...Until 3 AM EDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Shallow flooding is possible in the most vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. SAXIS VA MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 4.5 FT, MODERATE 5.5 FT, MAJOR 6.5 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 2.0 FT, MODERATE 3.0 FT, MAJOR 4.0 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 06/02 AM 4.2 1.7 1.3 1 NONE 06/02 PM 3.3 0.8 1.2 1 NONE 07/03 AM 4.0 1.5 1.1 1 NONE 07/03 PM 3.1 0.6 0.9 1 NONE 08/03 AM 3.9 1.4 1.3 1 NONE 08/04 PM 2.9 0.4 0.7 1 NONE NASSAWADOX CREEK AT BAYFORD VA MLLW CATEGORIES -
